name: Elemental
description: What happens if we don't make eco-friendly NFTs? We will slowly but surely make NFTs and CryptoCurrency one of the most polluting aspect of the internet. It's already way on its way to the top. We can stop that. Let go of old systems, use Proof of Stakes: either by jumping on blockchain that allows it, or enforce it on the leading blockchains. Money being the main factor, it is easier said that done, but I believe this ecosystem and the people in it can do better. We must do better.
